root.name: Shockwave Assault
root.description: Shockwave Assault contains Shock Wave and it's expansion Shock Wave: Operation Jumpgate and is a sci-fi air/space combat game, similar to Terminal Velocity. The game is set in 2019, as an alien force invades Earth, and the player - a rookie pilot - uses their F-177 fighter to fight back. The story is presented with live acted full motion video cutscenes.
